main event: A witness in Altadena observed a round reddish object moving in the sky on June 17, 1955.
interesting points: The object appeared to have no sound during observation., The sighting lasted approximately 10 minutes., The object was described as being roughly the size of a ball., The course of the object was from north to south., It was concluded that the sighting possibly resembled a balloon.
witness description: Witness J. Bettis and 2 others saw the object around 10:30 PM.
